userList.description: A type containing list of users.

user.description: Collection of the zone information list.

accessPointId.description: The identity of the access point the user is currently on, see note 1.

address.description: Address of user (e.g. 'sip' URI, 'tel' URI, 'acr' URI) currently on the access point, see note 1.

contextLocationInfo.description: Contextual information of a user location (e.g. aisle, floor, room number, etc.).

accuracy.description: Horizontal accuracy / (semi-major) uncertainty of location provided in meters, as defined in [14]. Present only if "shape" equals 4, 5 or 6

accuracyAltitude.description: Altitude accuracy / uncertainty of location provided in meters, as defined in [14]. Present only if "shape" equals 3 or 4

accuracySemiMinor.description: Horizontal accuracy / (semi-major) uncertainty of location provided in meters, as defined in [14]. Present only if "shape" equals 4, 5 or 6

altitude.description: Location altitude relative to the WGS84 ellipsoid surface.

confidence.description: Confidence by which the position of a target entity is known to be within the shape description, expressed as a percentage and defined in [14]. Present only if "shape" equals 1, 4 or 6

latitude.description: Location latitude, expressed in the range -90 deg to +90 deg. Cardinality greater than one only if "shape" equals 7.

longitude.description: Location longitude, expressed in the range -180 deg to +180 deg. Cardinality greater than one only if "shape" equals 7.

orientationMajorAxis.description: Angle of orientation of the major axis, expressed in the range 0 deg to 180 deg, as defined in [14]. Present only if "shape" equals 4 or 6

shape.description:
Shape information, as detailed in [14], associated with the reported location coordinate:

1 = ELLIPSOID_ARC

2 = ELLIPSOID_POINT

3 = ELLIPSOID_POINT_ALTITUDE

4 = ELLIPSOID_POINT_ALTITUDE_UNCERT_ELLIPSOID

5 = ELLIPSOID_POINT_UNCERT_CIRCLE

6 = ELLIPSOID_POINT_UNCERT_ELLIPSE

7 = POLYGON

nanoSeconds.description: The nanoseconds part of the time. Time is defined as Unix-time since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

seconds.description: The seconds part of the time. Time is defined as Unix-time since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

velocity.description: Structure with attributes relating to the target entity's velocity, as defined in [14].

bearing.description: Bearing, expressed in the range 0 deg to 360 deg, as defined in [14].

horizontalSpeed.description: Horizontal speed, expressed in km/h and defined in [14].

uncertainty.description: Horizontal uncertainty, as defined in [14]. Present only if "velocityType" equals 3 or 4

velocityType.description:
Velocity information, as detailed in [14], associated with the reported location coordinate:

1 = HORIZONTAL

2 = HORIZONTAL_VERTICAL

3 = HORIZONTAL_UNCERT

4 = HORIZONTAL_VERTICAL_UNCERT

verticalSpeed.description: Vertical speed, expressed in km/h and defined in [14]. Present only if "velocityType" equals 2 or 4

verticalUncertainty.description: Vertical uncertainty, as defined in [14]. Present only if "velocityType" equals 4

nanoSeconds.description: The nanoseconds part of the time. Time is defined as Unix-time since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

seconds.description: The seconds part of the time. Time is defined as Unix-time since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

zoneId.description: The identity of the zone the user is currently within, see note 1.

items.x-etsi-notes:
NOTE 1:	As specified in [5], clause 5.2.2.7.
NOTE 2: 	As specified in [5], clause 5.2.2.5.
